name: Math for the Math God (Jam Version)
name_original: Math for the Math God (Jam Version)
description:
You are the God of Math, and those pesky humans are fighting agains your domain. Use your mathematical powers to subdue them to your will and conquer the world!

Controls:

Mouse: Interact with buttons

Spacebar: Start game/Restart after GameOver

Assets used: 

Game Sound FX by Marvin Games

Free Music Pack Vol.1 by FinalGateStudios

Heartbit by Void
